vote.title: Authorize a two-year master agreement for the purchase of drinking water treatment chemicals for the Water Utilities Department - Texas Lime Company in the estimated amount of $11,517,750.00, Evonik Corporation in the estimated amount of $1,054,500.00, Pencco, Inc. in the estimated amount of $30,928,449.00, and Chemtrade Chemicals US, LLC in the estimated amount of $5,926,002.00, lowest responsible bidders of five - Total estimated amount of $49,426,701.00 - Financing:  Dallas Water Utilities Fund
